DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass whether administration oxytocin intrapartum ( Oxt ) effect Neonatal Primitive Reflexes ( RNP ) dose dependent . The secondary objective ass effect exclusive breastfeed 3 month
DOC.brief_title: Intrapartum Oxytocin Administration Affects Primitive Neonatal Reflexes
DOC.detailed_description: Patients Methods Prospective case-control study perform tertiary hospital . Cases : mother-child dyad Oxt administer birth process ( n = 53 ) . Controls : mother-child dyad without Oxt ( n = 45 ) . The RNP record camcorder biological nurturing position . An observer blind group dose Oxt codify RNP ( reach/not reach ) . To assess type breastfeed telephone call make 3 month old RN .
DOC.criteria: Healthy singleton term infant deliver vaginally Apgar 5 min > 7 ; Expressed desire administer pregnancy breastfeeding ; Signed informed consent Preterm neonate ; Fetal chromosomal abnormality diagnose utero modify adaptation extrauterine environment ; Hospitalization mother ICU ; Hospitalization follow 48 hour neonate birth ; Wish artificial feeding parturition ; Language difficulty ; Completion caesarean delivery
